generic.end: Raid leader can react with :x: to end the call.
generic.ended: Run is in progress or complete.

event.name: Event Dungeons
event.desc:
React with :yes: and join voice to participate.
React with :key: if you have any event keys and are willing to pop.
React with a class or ability if you plan to bring it to the run.

cult.name: Lost Halls - Cult
cult.desc:
React with :cult: and join voice to participate.
React with :hallskey: if you have a key and are willing to pop.
React with a class and ability if you plan to bring it to the run.

void.name: Lost Halls - Void
void.desc:
React with :void: and join voice to participate.
React with :hallskey: if you have a key and are willing to pop.
React with :vial: if you have a vial and are willing to pop.
React with a class and ability if you plan to bring it to the run.

tomb.name: Tomb of the Ancients
tomb.desc:
React with :tomb: and join voice to participate.
React with :tombkey: if you have a key and are willing to pop.
React with a class and ability if you plan to bring it to the run.

thicket.name: Secluded Thicket
thicket.desc:
React with :thicc: and join voice to participate.
React with :thicckey: if you have a key and are willing to pop.

ot.name: Ocean Trench
ot.desc:
React with :tomb: and join voice to participate.
React with :tombkey: if you have a key and are willing to pop.
React with a :planewalker: if you can and want to rush.

shatts.name: Shatters
shatts.desc:
React with :shatts: and join voice to participate.
React with :shattskey: if you have a key and are willing to pop.
React with a class or ability if you plan to bring it to the run.
React with :planewalker: if you have a Planewalker or a Trickster.
React with :priest: if you have a priest capable of supporting lavawalking.
